name: elastic-search-demo
description: A simple project showcasing usage of Elastic search using nodeJS

scripts.dev: NODE_ENV=development nodemon --watch 'src/**/*' -e ts,tsx --exec ts-node  -r dotenv/config --files ./src/server.ts | pino-pretty -i hostname,pid,req,res,id,responseTime,startDate,levelInt,severity --messageKey=message -t

author: Ishan Mahajan
